summary: This is a calendar entry for the arraignment of Ghislaine Maxwell on the S2 indictment, scheduled for April 23, 2021, at the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York. It includes logistical details such as the courtroom, teleconference access for the public, and the event organizer.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the arraignment event on the S2 indictment.

events.title: Maxwell Arraignment on S2 Indictment
events.description: Scheduled court arraignment for Ghislaine Maxwell on the S2 indictment.

locations: U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's arraignment on the S2 indictment was scheduled for April 23, 2021, at 18:30 UTC.
The event was to be held in Courtroom 24B at 500 Pearl Street, the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.
The public could access the proceeding via a designated teleconference line and access code.
The calendar entry was created and last modified on April 19, 2021.
The document is an external email containing a calendar event, indicating formal scheduling of a major legal proceeding.
